title: ALI Certified Falcon 10,000LB 2-Post Overhead Single Release Direct Drive Car Lift with 3 Year Warranty
body_html:
All 2-Post Car Lifts

  • Industry leading 3 YEAR WARRANTY (a $499 value!)

  • Three Sets of Truck Adapters (High Extension) Included

  • Three variable Drive Through 88 1/8", 94 1/16", 100"! Triple Telescoping Arm Design!

  • Dual Direct Drive Hydraulic Cylinders

  • All Robot Welded Structure with Durable Powder Coated Finish

  • Flawless Manual Single Point Lock Release System

  • Oversized 57" Tall Carriages

Falcon TR-10C and TR-10CX models achieve the prestigious Gold Label for ALI Certification! This mark signifies rigorous testing and compliance with the toughest industry standards, and they satisfy all insurance company requirements. To learn more about the Automotive Lift Institute (ALI) and the ANSI/ALI/ETL Certification Program, please visit www.autolift.org.

We are proud to offer an industry leading 3 year warranty for all parts (a $499 value)! Replacement parts are available upon request. We welcome suggestions to improve our products and service!

Free shipping to lower 48 states with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Car lifts require on-site forklift (no liftgate). We strongly recommend against renting a forklift; expense not reimbursed. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $200 Discount): Chicago (IL), Mobile (AL), Tacoma (WA), and Watsontown (PA).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

This Model		 HW-10ASY
for comparison

Features

  • Single-point safety lock release
  • Automatic arm lock restraints
  • Relief valve built-in power pump to prevent overloading
  • Door guard protection rubber
  • Up-limit switch to protect cylinders working stroke used in safe length scope
  • Heavy duty 3/8" diameter cable and 5" pulley that reduce high stress on synchronization process and increase cable life
  • Stiffened base plate 13/16" thickness
  • Ultra-high molecular self-lubricating nylon slider that ensures carriage smooth moving up and down
  • Lifting operation by pressing the "UP" button on the motor
  • Manual lowering operation by pressing the lever
  • Relief valve built-in power pump to prevent overloading

All 2-Post Car Lifts
